verses.roman:
puruṣottama paṇḍita, āra raghunātha
vanamālī kavicandra, āra vaidyanātha

synonyms: puruṣottama paṇḍita—of the name Puruṣottama Paṇḍita; āra raghunātha—and Raghunātha; vanamālī kavicandra—of the name Vanamālī Kavicandra; āra—and; vaidyanātha—of the name Vaidyanātha.
translation: Puruṣottama Paṇḍita, Raghunātha, Vanamālī Kavicandra and Vaidyanātha were the twenty-ninth, thirtieth, thirty-first and thirty-second branches of Advaita Ācārya.
